chat.welcomeMessage:
Welcome to Yorby! ðŸŽ¯ 

I'm here to help match you with your perfect job opportunity. 

To get started quickly, do you have a resume you can upload? This will help me understand your background so we can focus on what really matters - what you're looking for in your next role.

You can drag and drop a file or click the paperclip icon below. Don't have one handy? No problem - we can start with a quick conversation instead!

freeATS.subtitle: Track candidates, manage your pipeline, collaborate with your teamâ€”no credit card required.

benefit1.title: Customizable Pipeline
benefit1.description: Drag-and-drop stages that match your hiring process

benefit2.title: Team Collaboration
benefit2.description: Invite recruiters, hiring managers, and interviewers

benefit3.title: Forever Free Core
benefit3.description: Essential ATS features, always free. No limits on jobs or candidates

whatsTheCatch.title: Wait, what's the catch?
whatsTheCatch.description: There isn't one. Our core ATS is completely free forever. We make money by offering optional AI features that help you hire candidates faster. Use them when you need them, skip them when you don't.

howItWorks.title: Simple to Start, Powerful When You Need It
howItWorks.subtitle: Set up in 2 minutes, scale as you grow

step2.title: Post Your Jobs

step3.title: Track Candidates
step3.description: Move applicants through stages with one click

comparison.title: Built for How Startups Actually Hire

points.point3: AI features when you need them
